summary: The diff addresses REQ-16 by modifying App.tsx to add a 5-second loading timeout guard that prevents indefinite spinner states, and by refactoring GamePlay.tsx to use prop-based navigation with local balance state and non-blocking backend recording. GameGrid.tsx is also updated to call navigateTo with the full game name. The core requirement of fixing the loading/spinner issue is addressed, with fallback logic and a deterministic timeout implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: All 6 games (Dragon vs Tiger, 7 Up Down, Andar Bahar, Ludo, Mines, Crash) are individually tested and render correctly.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows structural fixes to GamePlay.tsx and App.tsx but there is no evidence of test coverage or verification that all 6 individual game UIs render correctly. No test files are added or modified.

hallucinated_features.description: 5-second loading timeout guard added to App.tsx for overall actor initialization and profile checking
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specifies fixing the loading issue in GamePlay.tsx specifically. The timeout guard was added to App.tsx's overall loading state which is a broader scope than what was strictly requested, though it does support the requirement indirectly.
